message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. I believe it's a great deal for you, considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,500, which is still a good price for you considering the value you see in the product. Let's meet in the middle and make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $11,000. I hope this proposal will be more acceptable.
